newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIAN DOMESTIC INVESTMENTS 4.5 PCT UP IN 1996.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIAN DOMESTIC INVESTMENTS 4.5 PCT UP IN 1996.

text.p: Investment in Romania rose 4.5 percent last year, almost half the forecast level and a 1995 growth of 8.1 percent, a National Statistics Board (CNS) report showed on Thursday.

It said last year's increase -- the smallest over the past three years -- was led investment in the manufacturing industry, which took one third of the 20.67 trillion lei worth of the year's investment.

Retail trade and real estate each took 13 percent of investment last year. No official investment growth forecast for 1997 has been released so far. ($=6,725 lei) -- Mirela Eremia, Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
